---
layout: post
title: 'Magebound'
---
<div class="social-media">
    <i class="fa fa-github" aria-hidden="true"></i> Private Repository
</div>
<b>Unity: Shader Graph & VFX Graph | BeepBox</b>

An isometric magic-based beat 'em up game. Made as part of a game development course by a six-person team in four weeks.

<div align="center">
<iframe frameborder="0" src="https://itch.io/embed/3186759?border_width=5&amp;bg_color=000000&amp;fg_color=e8e7ce&amp;link_color=c486d3&amp;border_color=000000" width="95%" height="175"><a href="https://rosehairedsheep.itch.io/magebound">Magebound by rosehairedsheep, JanneTyn, rs_sakuras, villle, veldoodles, HunterElu</a></iframe>
</div>

---
##### Interesting Contributions

Visual Effects:

- All base-form spell effects (excluding synergy effects), 18 total:

Music:

- An adaptive battle theme based on the player's element:
